mapper.insert: insert into TB_ALARM( ALARM_NO , STU_NO , ALARM_CN , ALARM_CD , ALARM_DT , ALARM_CHECK_CD , PROJ_NO) values( seq_alarm.nextval, #{stuNo},#{alarmCn},#{alarmCd},sysdate,'N',#{projNo} )
mapper.select:
SELECT MJ.ALARM_NO, MJ.STU_NO, MJ.ALARM_CN, MJ.ALARM_CD, MJ.ALARM_DT, MJ.ALARM_CHECK_CD, MJ.PROJ_NO, MJ.USER_NM, MJ.PROJ_NM, MJ.USER_PROFILE
FROM (SELECT A.ALARM_NO, A.STU_NO, A.ALARM_CN, A.ALARM_CD, A.ALARM_DT, A.ALARM_CHECK_CD, A.PROJ_NO, S.USER_NM, P.PROJ_NM, S.USER_PROFILE FROM TB_ALARM A JOIN TB_STU S ON S.STU_NO = A.STU_NO JOIN TB_PROJ P ON P.PROJ_NO = A.PROJ_NO ORDER BY A.ALARM_NO DESC) MJ WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
